message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,800. This is an excellent opportunity to save $1,200 compared to the standard retail price. I believe this investment will greatly benefit you and provide substantial value. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the purchase.
